item.title: Snake in Scala.js
item.description: This was a milestone week. For the first time in more than a decade, this ex-Flash developer has actually finished making a game. Admittedly the game is just a Snake clone, nothing fancy, but it is built on top of a custom engine I’m calling Indigo. Limited as Snake’s development needs were, getting from “it kinda works!” to “it’s kinda finished!” has helped drive out a surprising number of engine requirements.
